Event: my sister just ripped my heart outta myy fukkn chest.  im super hurt right now. she`s all i ever needed in this life.
Post: "I can't believe my sister did that to me! It's like, I gave her everything and she just threw it all away. I'm so hurt right now, I don't know how to move on from this. My whole life, I've been there for her, and this is how she repays me? It's like, I'm not good enough for her or something. I swear, some people are just so ungrateful. And now, I'm left with this gaping hole in my chest where my heart used to be. How am I supposed to fill that? It's like, she took everything from me and left me with nothing. I don't even know who I am anymore without her. 💔 #heartbroken #sisters #betrayal"
